text: Perotrochus amabilis, common name the lovely slit shell, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pleurotomariidae. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 50 mm and 93 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Gulf of Mexico, the Caribbean Sea; in the Atlantic Ocean from Florida to Brazil. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Pleurotomariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1963
title: Perotrochus amabilis
